name: RADISH MASTER
description:
Created for Retrograde Jam 2.

Match your veggies in this NES-inspired puzzle game. Fill up fifteen baskets to win.

If you mismatch your harvest, it's game over. If your sprouts grow too long, they'll go to seed and drop a devastating flower that will instantly destroy your basket.

CONTROLS:

Left and right arrows: Move gardener and wheel.

Down arrow: Pluck sprouts.

Z key: Swap basket spaces.

Follow on Twitter and stay tuned for a post-mortem here on Itch!

Twitter: https://twitter.com/jonah_srg
